trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for Web Parts controls that under certain conditions must replace other Web Parts controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la classe base per i controlli Web part che in determinate condizioni devono sostituire altri controlli Web part in una pagina.

trans-unit.source: ProxyWebPart is the base class for a set of Web Parts controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>, that can be used as placeholders for other Web Parts controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: ProxyWebPart è la classe base per un set di controlli Web part, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>, che può essere utilizzato come segnaposto per altri controlli Web part in una pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a ProxyWebPart control will replace another Web Parts control when some type of error or failure has occurred.
trans-unit.target: In genere, un controllo ProxyWebPart sostituisce un altro controllo Web part quando un tipo di errore o si è verificato.

trans-unit.source: For example, when a user is not authorized to view a Web Parts control on a page, the intended Web Parts control is replaced with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, quando un utente non è autorizzato a visualizzare un controllo Web part in una pagina, il controllo Web part viene sostituito con il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>

trans-unit.source: When a Web Parts control cannot be loaded or a new instance of it cannot be created, the original Web Parts control is replaced with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Quando un controllo Web part non può essere caricato o non è possibile creare una nuova istanza, il controllo Web part originale viene sostituito con il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>

trans-unit.source: If the intended Web Parts control later becomes available to the user, it will be restored to the page and the object derived from the ProxyWebPart class will be removed.
trans-unit.target: Se il controllo Web part in un secondo momento diventa disponibile per l'utente, verrà ripristinato alla pagina e l'oggetto derivato dalla classe ProxyWebPart verrà rimosso.

trans-unit.source: The ProxyWebPart class does not save view state or control state.
trans-unit.target: La classe ProxyWebPart non salva lo stato di visualizzazione o lo stato del controllo.

trans-unit.source: If a Web Parts control is replaced by a ProxyWebPart object and then later becomes available, its view state and control state will be empty.
trans-unit.target: Se un controllo Web part viene sostituito da un oggetto ProxyWebPart e quindi successivamente diventa disponibile, il relativo stato di visualizzazione e lo stato del controllo sarà vuoti.

trans-unit.source: The ProxyWebPart object preserves personalization data for the Web Parts control that it replaced.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto ProxyWebPart conserva i dati di personalizzazione per i controlli Web part che sostituito.

trans-unit.source: If the original Web Parts control becomes available, its personalization data will be restored.
trans-unit.target: Se il controllo Web part originale diventa disponibile, verranno ripristinati i dati di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control saves personalization data, it does not save the properties of a ProxyWebPart object.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo Salva i dati di personalizzazione, non salva le proprietà di un oggetto ProxyWebPart.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it saves the properties of the control that the ProxyWebPart object replaced.
trans-unit.target: Al contrario, Salva le proprietà del controllo sostituito dall'oggetto ProxyWebPart.

trans-unit.source: If the original Web Parts control becomes available, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control will automatically load it.
trans-unit.target: Se il controllo Web part originale diventa disponibile, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo verrà caricato automaticamente tale</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object contains the ProxyWebPart object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>oggetto contiene l'oggetto ProxyWebPart.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>

trans-unit.source: The ID of the intended Web Parts control can be retrieved from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.OriginalID%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.GenericWebPartID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: L'ID di controlli Web part possono essere recuperato dalla replica prevista di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.OriginalID%2A>proprietà o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.GenericWebPartID%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.GenericWebPartID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.OriginalID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a ProxyWebPart object replaces a Web Parts control that is either the provider or consumer of a Web Parts connection, the connection is not activated but will not be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Se un oggetto ProxyWebPart sostituisce un controllo Web part che funge da provider o consumer di una connessione Web part, la connessione non è attivata, ma non verrà eliminata.

trans-unit.source: If the original Web Parts control becomes available, the connection will be reactivated.
trans-unit.target: Se il controllo Web part originale diventa disponibile, la connessione verrà riattivata.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart"></xref> class when a static Web Parts control (or server or user control) must be replaced.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart"> </xref> classe quando un controllo Web part statico (o controllo server o utente) deve essere sostituiti.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used to create a proxy Web Parts control to replace a static Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore viene utilizzato per creare un controllo di Web part proxy per sostituire un controllo statico di Web part.

trans-unit.source: To replace a dynamically created Web Parts control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> constructor to create the proxy Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Per sostituire un controllo Web part creato in modo dinamico, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>costruttore per la creazione di controlli Web part proxy.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to be replaced.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo di Web part da sostituire.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart"></xref> class when a dynamic Web Parts control must be replaced.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart"> </xref> classe quando dinamico di controlli Web part deve essere sostituito.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used to create a proxy Web Parts control to replace a dynamic Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore viene utilizzato per creare un controllo di Web part proxy per sostituire un controllo Web part dinamico.

trans-unit.source: To replace a static Web Parts control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%29> constructor to create a proxy Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Per sostituire un controllo Web part statico, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%29>costruttore per creare un controllo di Web part proxy.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%29>

trans-unit.source: A string that is the control ID (not the unique ID) of the control to replace.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che rappresenta l'ID (ID non univoco) del controllo da sostituire.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control is replaced, the ID is the ID of its child server control.
trans-unit.target: Se un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"> </xref> controllo viene sostituito, l'ID è l'ID del controllo server figlio.

trans-unit.source: A string that is the name of the <xref:System.Type> of the control to replace.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che rappresenta il nome del <xref:System.Type>del controllo da sostituire.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control is replaced, the type name is the type of its child server control.
trans-unit.target: Se un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"> </xref> controllo viene sostituito, il nome del tipo è il tipo del controllo server figlio.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to the user control to replace.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il percorso per il controllo utente da sostituire.

trans-unit.source: A string that returns the ID of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control, if that type of control is being replaced.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che restituisce l'ID di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"> </xref> il controllo, se tale tipo di controllo deve essere sostituito.

trans-unit.source: This is needed for controls that do not inherit from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> base class.
trans-unit.target: Questa operazione è necessaria per i controlli che non ereditano dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> classe di base.

trans-unit.source: originalPath is specified but genericWebPartID is or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: originalPathviene specificato ma genericWebPartID è o una stringa vuota.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ID*> property from the generic Web Parts control replaced by a proxy Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore della <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ID*>proprietà dal controllo Web part generico sostituito da un proxy di controlli Web part.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ID*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> object replaces a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control, this property contains the value from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>oggetto sostituisce un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>(controllo), questa proprietà contiene il valore di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ID*> value.
trans-unit.target: Stringa contenente il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ID*>valore.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ID*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the programmatic identifier assigned to the Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'identificatore a livello di codice assegnato al controllo Web part.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> object will contain the same value in its ID property as the control it replaced.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>oggetto conterrà lo stesso valore nella relativa proprietà ID del controllo sostituito.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>contenente l'identificatore.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadControlState*> to prevent loading previously saved state for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadControlState*>per evitare lo stato di caricamento salvato in precedenza per un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadControlState*>

trans-unit.source: The LoadControlState method overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadControlState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to prevent loading the control state.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override di metodo LoadControlState <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadControlState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>per impedire il caricamento dello stato del controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadControlState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The method does not load the control state or perform any other action.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo non caricare lo stato di controllo oppure eseguire qualsiasi altra azione.

trans-unit.source: The previously saved state data.
trans-unit.target: I dati di stato salvato in precedenza.

trans-unit.source: Overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState*> to prevent loading previously saved view state for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState*>per impedire il caricamento dello stato di visualizzazione precedentemente salvato per una <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState*>

trans-unit.source: The LoadViewState method overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to prevent loading the view state.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override di metodo LoadViewState <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>per impedire il caricamento dello stato di visualizzazione.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The method does not load the view state or perform any other action.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo non caricare lo stato di visualizzazione o eseguire altre azioni.

trans-unit.source: The previously saved state data.
trans-unit.target: I dati di stato salvato in precedenza.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*> of the Web Parts control replaced by the proxy Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>del controllo Web part sostituito dal proxy di controlli Web part.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> object replaces a Web Parts control, the OriginalID property contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> of the replaced control.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>oggetto sostituisce un controllo Web part, la proprietà OriginalID contiene il <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>del controllo sostituito.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>

trans-unit.source: If the replaced control is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object, this property contains the ID from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ChildControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Se il controllo sostituito un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>dell'oggetto, questa proprietà contiene l'ID di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ChildControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ChildControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*> value of the Web Parts control replaced by the proxy Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Stringa contenente il <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>valore del controllo Web part sostituito dal proxy di controlli Web part.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the path to the user control being replaced.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il percorso per il controllo utente da sostituire.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to a user control being replaced.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il percorso di un controllo utente da sostituire.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Type> of the Web Parts control replaced by the proxy Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref:System.Type>del controllo Web part sostituito dal proxy di controlli Web part.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> object replaces a control, this property contains the <xref:System.Type> of the control that the proxy Web Parts control replaces.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>oggetto sostituisce un controllo, questa proprietà contiene il <xref:System.Type>del controllo che sostituisce il controllo di Web part proxy.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the <xref:System.Type> of the control replaced by the proxy Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Stringa contenente il <xref:System.Type>del controllo sostituito dal proxy di controlli Web part.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Saves any server control state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Salva le modifiche dello stato che si sono verificati dopo il postback della pagina al server di un controllo server.

trans-unit.source: Returns the server control's current state.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il server di stato corrente del controllo.

trans-unit.source: If there is no state associated with the control, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se non è associato il controllo alcuno stato, questo metodo restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Saves any state that was modified after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*> method was invoked.
trans-unit.target: Salva qualsiasi stato che è stato modificato dopo la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*>chiamata del metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the current view state of the control; otherwise, if there is no view state associated with the control, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che contiene lo stato di visualizzazione corrente del controllo. in caso contrario, se non è alcuno stato di visualizzazione associato al controllo, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
